name: View (UOWM Game Development, wahazwan, raynatang, Chiew, Aidan Sanjay)
name_original: View (UOWM Game Development, wahazwan, raynatang, Chiew, Aidan Sanjay)
description:
View

Enter View, a narrative driven puzzle-platformer involving a teenager, Alex to overcome his loss and recall selectively forgotten memories through the use of his glasses. His glasses acts as a platform between reality & how he views reality which is affected by his emotions and mental state.

Take on Alex, a 17 year old who recently loss his best friend & corgi, Max. Take this short journey alongside Alex to go through various levels & puzzles to uncover his emotions & memories through the use of his diary. 

Developed by Insomniax
